The search identified 110 sources. Following screening of titles and abstracts and removing duplicates, we evaluated eight articles in full text. Among these, we found five relevant articles (one pilot study, one preliminary communication, one novel report, one case report, one descriptive study).

The five studies include a total of 27 patients who received CPT therapies for COVID‐19.
